sentences.en: a college steeped in history
sentences.cn: 一所历史悠久的学院

sentences.en: a decision that changed the course of history
sentences.cn: 改变历史进程的决定

sentences.en: A guide gives a brief talk on the history of the site.
sentences.cn: 导游简要地介绍了那个遗址的历史。

sentences.en: a museum devoted to local history
sentences.cn: 专门介绍当地历史的博物馆

sentences.en: an interesting period in Egyptian history
sentences.cn: 埃及历史上一段有趣的时期

sentences.en: Bradley will go down in history as Los Angeles' longest serving mayor.
sentences.cn: 布拉德利将作为洛杉矶任期最长的市长被载入史册。

sentences.en: History shows that the usual response to violent protest is repression.
sentences.cn: 历史表明，一般对待暴力抗议的回应就是镇压。

sentences.en: I fell under the influence of a history master.
sentences.cn: 我当时深受一位历史老师的影响。

sentences.en: I was making a laughing stock of myself, but that's history now.
sentences.cn: 我以前总使自己成为笑柄，不过现在这已成为历史了。

sentences.en: It is important that we put Jesus into the context of history.
sentences.cn: 我们将耶稣置于历史环境中来看是很重要的。

sentences.en: John Stevenson is Reader in History at the University of Sheffield.
sentences.cn: 约翰·史蒂文森是谢菲尔德大学的历史学高级讲师。

sentences.en: Kournikova is poised to rewrite the tennis history books.
sentences.cn: 库尔尼科娃决心改写网球史。

sentences.en: No man in recent history has done more to rebuild the Democratic Party.
sentences.cn: 他对重建民主党的贡献在近代史上无人能及。

sentences.en: one of the darkest episodes in American history
sentences.cn: 美国历史上最黑暗的事件之一

sentences.en: Other meteor storms have occurred in recorded history .
sentences.cn: 在有记载的历史上发生过其他的流星暴。

sentences.en: She made history come alive with tales from her own memories.
sentences.cn: 通过讲述自己记忆中的故事，她把逝去的岁月变得生动起来。

sentences.en: Texas has a long history of trade with Mexico.
sentences.cn: 得克萨斯州与墨西哥的贸易往来历史悠久。

sentences.en: The boundaries between history and storytelling are always being blurred and muddled.
sentences.cn: 历史和轶闻的分界向来是模糊而混乱的。

sentences.en: The boy's mother had a history of abusing her children.
sentences.cn: 男孩的母亲过去常虐待自己的孩子。

sentences.en: the early history of Scotland
sentences.cn: 苏格兰的早期历史

sentences.en: The island's ruggedness symbolises our history and the character of the people.
sentences.cn: 这个岛屿的凹凸险峻象征着我们的历史和民族性格。

sentences.en: the mainframe will soon be history.
sentences.cn: 这种主机很快就会成为历史。

sentences.en: The whole idea was to give history a happy gloss.
sentences.cn: 整个想法就是要粉饰历史。

sentences.en: There is hostility among traditionalists to this method of teaching history.
sentences.cn: 传统主义者反对这种讲授历史的方法。

sentences.en: they teamed up, discovered that they could make music, and the rest is history.
sentences.cn: 他们协力合作，发现他们可以制作音乐，余下的就不饶费舌了。

sentences.en: Throughout history the achievements of women have been largely ignored.
sentences.cn: 从古至今，妇女的成就都被大大地忽视了。

sentences.en: Willy Brandt made history by visiting East Germany in 1970.
sentences.cn: 威利·勃兰特1970年访问东德，书写了历史新篇章。

sentences.en: With apologies to my old history teacher, who needs history lessons?
sentences.cn: 这话对不住我亲爱的历史老师，不过有谁需要历史课呢？

sentences.en: Your doctor will ask for your medical history.
sentences.cn: 医生会询问你的病历。

words.tran_cn: 有历史意义的；历史上著名的
历史的；史学的；基于史实的
历史上地；从历史观点上说

phrases.tran_cn: 西洋古代史；家喻户晓的故事
开发史；成长历程；发展进程
创造历史，做名垂青史的事
余下的不饶费舌，其他的都众所周知了
时间推移；随时间的变化；时间关系曲线图

trans.tran_cn: 历史，历史学，发展史，履历，经历，（某地的）沿革
trans.tran_en: all the things that happened in the past, especially the political, social, or economic development of a nation
